Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Statistics dashboard permissions and access control

- Add admin check logic to conditionally show admin-only features
- Hide "Matching" tab from regular users (admin-only)
- Remove email column from Participants tab for non-admin users
- Fix empty Sponsors tab by using direct Supabase query instead of admin API
- Fix empty Gifts tab by using direct Supabase query instead of admin API

Regular users now see:
- 4 tabs: Statistics, Participants, Sponsors, Gifts
- Participant data without emails (Name, Expertise, Joined only)
- Full sponsors and gifts data

Admin users see:
- All 5 tabs including Matching
- Complete participant data with emails
- Full assignment list in Matching tab
